guides.title: Run A Daily Standup
guides.description: A guide to help you get up and running with your team's daily standups.

guides.title: Retrospectives: Good Practices
guides.description: Retrospectives feeling stale? Here's some tips to get more value out of the ceremony.

articles.title: Does Less Feedback Mean We're Less Agile?
articles.description: Teams operate more efficiently when they receive consistent and constructive feedback faster

articles.title: Delivering Value Using Personas
articles.description: A common challenge for teams is identifying and delivering the value proposition in stories. Learn how adopting personas can help.

articles.title: Be Agile
articles.description: Our team is commonly asked How can we DO agile? The real question, however, is, How can we BE agile?

articles.title: Simplifying User Stories
articles.description: Whether your team has great, workable stories today, or every story is carrying over every sprint, these tips for simplifying stories are great and proven.

articles.title: Introducing the Agile Connection
articles.description: Welcome to the Agile Connection, a monthly newsletter to keep you up to date on agile best practices. Written by our team of Disney Agile Coaches, Marco, Mark and Mike.
